data.message: Thats funny I just said  the same thing too and "this too shall pass! Just watched 8 miles tonight! I have to say this....my husband who is a heating and air owner in a small town who does not like rap or hip-hop not that you r any of that....a league of you own says....You were born for what you do! You have a gift like no other! You put your heart and soul into your songs and we feel it and think Omg! Don't stop you have the gift that comes from your soul and you bring it always no doubt! Come back to us!
